about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Web Development Team with passion for modern technologies
about.description: We create modern and responsive websites with focus on user experience and performance. We cover full stack development using the latest technologies and have extensive experience in designing and implementing complex web applications - from simple landing pages to complex enterprise systems. We constantly educate ourselves and follow the latest trends in web development to offer the best solutions for our clients.
